title: Customer Conflicts and Disputes
description: De-escalation and resolution strategies for serious customer conflicts

fareDispute.scenario: Customer claims fare is too high or incorrect
deEscalation: Stay calm and empathetic
Show them the fare breakdown in app
Explain factors (surge pricing, route, time)
Redirect to platform for fare disputes

phrases.english: I understand your concern about the fare. The price is set by the app based on distance, time, and demand. I cannot change it, but you can dispute it through the app support.
phrases.spanish: Entiendo su preocupación por la tarifa. El precio lo establece la aplicación según distancia, tiempo y demanda. No puedo cambiarlo, pero puede disputarlo a través del soporte de la aplicación.
phrases.pronunciation: en-tee-EN-doh soo preh-oh-koo-pah-see-ON por lah tah-REE-fah...

fareDispute.documentation: Screenshot fare breakdown, route taken, time stamps. Report through app immediately

serviceComplaint.scenario: Customer complains about your service quality
deEscalation: Listen without interrupting
Acknowledge their feelings
Ask specific questions about the issue
Offer immediate solution if possible

phrases.english: I'm sorry you feel that way. Can you tell me specifically what I can do to improve your experience right now?
phrases.spanish: Lamento que se sienta así. ¿Puede decirme específicamente qué puedo hacer para mejorar su experiencia ahora mismo?

serviceComplaint.recovery: Service recovery: immediate action (adjust temperature, change route, etc.) can turn complaint into positive rating

routeDisagreement.scenario: Customer claims you took wrong or longer route
deEscalation: Show them GPS route in app
Explain why (traffic, road closures, etc.)
Offer to change route if trip ongoing
Reference app navigation as your guide

phrases.english: I followed the app's navigation to avoid traffic. Here's the route we took. If you prefer a different route, I'm happy to use it.
phrases.spanish: Seguí la navegación de la aplicación para evitar tráfico. Aquí está la ruta que tomamos. Si prefiere una ruta diferente, con gusto la uso.
phrases.pronunciation: seh-GHEE lah nah-veh-gah-see-ON deh lah ah-plee-kah-see-ON...

routeDisagreement.protection: GPS records protect you. App shows exact route and time. Platform reviews this in disputes

personalConflict.scenario: Customer makes personal attacks or insults
deEscalation: Do NOT respond to personal attacks
Stay professional no matter what
Give one warning about respectful communication
End trip if abuse continues

phrases.english: I need us to communicate respectfully. If you cannot, I will have to end this trip.
phrases.spanish: Necesito que nos comuniquemos respetuosamente. Si no puede, tendré que terminar este viaje.

personalConflict.boundariesImportant: You are never required to tolerate verbal abuse. Platform supports ending trips for this reason

deEscalation: Do not argue with intoxicated person
Keep responses short and simple
Get to destination safely and quickly
Pull over if behavior escalates
Call police if you feel threatened

phrases.english: I'm getting you home safely. Please remain calm and seated.
phrases.spanish: Lo/La estoy llevando a casa de forma segura. Por favor manténgase calmado/a y sentado/a.
phrases.pronunciation: loh/lah es-TOY yeh-VAN-doh ah KAH-sah deh FOR-mah seh-GOO-rah...

intoxicatedConflict.safety: Your safety first. Intoxicated people are unpredictable. Trust your instincts. Pull over and call police if needed

fraudClaim.scenario: Customer threatens false report or bad rating unless you comply with unreasonable demand
deEscalation: Stay calm - this is platform extortion
Do NOT comply with unreasonable demands
Document everything
Report to platform immediately after trip
Dashcam evidence invaluable here

phrases.english: I understand you're upset. All trip details are recorded by the platform including GPS, time, and communication. I'll submit a report about this conversation.
phrases.spanish: Entiendo que está molesto/a. Todos los detalles del viaje son registrados por la plataforma incluyendo GPS, tiempo y comunicación. Enviaré un reporte sobre esta conversación.

fraudClaim.platformProtection: Platforms investigate threats and extortion. Your documentation protects you. These customers often deactivated

activeListening.technique: Let customer fully express concern without interrupting
phrases: Escucho lo que dice... (I hear what you're saying...)
Debe ser frustrante... (That must be frustrating...)

acknowledgment.technique: Validate feelings without necessarily agreeing with accusations
phrases: Veo por qué eso le molestaría. (I see why that would upset you.)
Tiene derecho a estar insatisfecho si... (You have a right to be dissatisfied if...)
¿Qué le ayudaría a resolver esto? (What would help resolve this for you?)
Esto es lo que puedo hacer... (This is what I can do...)
La plataforma puede ayudar con... (The platform can help with...)
Quiero ayudar, pero necesito que hablemos con calma. (I want to help, but I need us to speak calmly.)
Entiendo su frustración, pero no puedo continuar si hay insultos. (I understand your frustration, but I cannot continue if there are insults.)
Esto requiere intervención de la plataforma. Voy a reportarlo para que le ayuden. (This requires platform intervention. I'll report it so they can help you.)
Soporte puede manejar esto mejor que yo. (Support can handle this better than I can.)

howToDocument: Write immediately after incident while memory fresh
Dashcam footage if you have one

immediateReport: Use in-app reporting for all significant conflicts
Report before customer does - proactive better than reactive
Ask for protection from retaliatory rating

culturalNotes.note: US system relies on documentation and platform mediation, not personal resolution
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Less personal relationship-based than Colombian conflict resolution

culturalNotes.note: You have right to refuse abusive customers and end trips for safety
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: More formal worker protections than Colombian informal economy

culturalNotes.note: GPS, time stamps, and app communications are evidence. Document everything
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: More systematic than verbal Colombian agreements

callPolice: Customer attempting to drive away with you

policeReport.importance: Police report strengthens your case with platform and provides legal protection
policeReport.howTo: Call 911 for immediate threats, or non-emergency line (311) for post-incident reports
